• Solutions
    Open-source Tools
    • Meta-aggregation
      Meta Aggregation API finds the best price and route for market orders between quotes from supported aggregators
    • ClickHouse Web3
      ClickHouse Fork with web3 flavor
    • Data Sources Repo
      Here you can find(or add a new one!) configs for blockchains and AMMs we support at DexGuru
    • Assets Repo
      Tokens and Exchanges Logos. This repo is a primary source of token images we use at DexGuru.
    • Tags Repo
      A tag can really be anything. It unites multiple tokens with similar qualities into one set. Here you can find list of tags we use at DexGuru
